channel.title: Not sure where to put this [question]
channel.description: Does anyone know what the Player Moderator/Forum Moderator Query system was like in 2006? We need it for our modcp, we know how it looks, but do the pmods/fmods create a ticket we can reply to? is it like a second message centre? Any help is appreciated, please move if in wrong section, sorry.

item.title: Not sure where to put this [question]
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

they didn’t not have directly link with jagex staff back then, only by the forums.

Read full topic
item.source: Not sure where to put this [question]

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m not sure about that never heard of it. To be quite honest not much has been ever said about the pmod/fmod centres cause jagex did not want it to be told.

item.dc:creator: @nbkdingoman nbkdingoman
item.description:
@nbkdingoman wrote:

Correct, but they both have a query like system (so it says in pmod faq) that they can open a query with Jagex about things.

Read full topic

item.title: Not sure where to put this [question]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

pmods have a checkmark on their report abuve interface to mute a player.

fmods have a centre on the forums like a secret board where you can contact jagex directly
